# Question 1

## Finding rows that have missing values 

```{r}
missing_value_rows <- airquality[rowSums(is.na(airquality)) >0, ]

missing_value_rows
```

# Question 2

## Ozone Summary Stats

```{r}
mean(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)

sd(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)

min(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)

max(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
```

## Temp Summary Stats

```{r}
mean(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)

sd(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)

min(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)

max(airquality$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)
```

# Question 3

## Y variable

```{r}
Y <- cars$dist
```

## Design Matrix

```{r}
X <- cbind(1, cars$speed)
```

## Beta hat (parameter estimation)

```{r}
b_hat <- solve( t(X) %*% (X) ) %*% t(X) %*% Y

b_hat

```

# Question 4

## Built in Function (Linear Model)

```{r}
lm(Y ~ cars$speed)
```
